name: Taco Universe
description:
The WebGL build is not stable (damn coroutines) so downloading the Zip file is preferable

Rumors roam among the most remote taverns in the universe, it is said that in some world resides the one and only perfect taco, the perfection personified of the most tasty food of Mexican origin. Juan, a pure-bred Mexican, explores galaxies in search of that edible deity.

Due to Juan's thirst for adventure, he will not stop running. There will be nothing to stop Juan from reaching his goal. He will face aliens, ancient traps and abysmal cliffs.

Would you like to live the adventures of Juan? Play right now!

(Note due to the WebGL the game might softlock, solution is sadly to refresh and restart || Also you can download the game to avoid that  😉 )

Controls:

- Z  to Jump

- X to Dash/Slide

- Z+X Reset player

- Menus also work with Z (next button)  X(press button)
